name: The SKIES
description: The Skies is a unique combination of post-apocalyptic MMORPG and FPS with a non-linear storyline, in which you follow your own path or join other players to conquer the wasteland.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64 bit: Win 7, Win 8 Processor: Intel Core i5-650, 3.2 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660ti (2 GB Memory or higher) or AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB Memory or higher) Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Minimum internet speed 1Mbit
recommended_requirements: OS: 64 bit: Win 7, Win 8 Processor: Intel Core i5-650, 3.2 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660ti (2 GB Memory or higher) or AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB Memory or higher) Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: Minimum internet speed 1Mbit
